title: attack type
text:
There are 3 types of attacks:

Melee (MEL), Ranged (RNG), or Magic (MAG).

Melee (MEL) attacks can only be performed if:

- y The attacking model has line-of-sight to its target (see Line-of-Sight pg.52).

- y The attacking model is engaging an enemy model that is within reach of a melee weapon of the attacking model.

Note: Melee attacks with greater than Reach(1) only provide the extended Reach during the owning model's activation. Out of the model's activation, the attack has Reach(1).
